```{r library, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r ggplot_theme, include = FALSE}
theme_set(theme_bw())
```


# Definition

```{r define_parameters}

parameters <- tibble(
  flag_f = 2,
  flag_qc = 1,
  depth_min = 150,
  bottomdepth_min = 500,
  lat_max = 65,
  year_JGOFS_start = 1981,
  year_JGOFS_end = 1999,
  year_GOSHIP_end = 2012,
  lon_Atl_section = 335.5,
  lon_Pac_section = 190.5,
  lon_Ind_section = 70.5)

depth_levels <- c(0,100,500,2000)

```

# Overview

```{r print_parameter_table}

parameters_long <- parameters %>% 
  pivot_longer(1:length(parameters),
               names_to = "parameter",
               values_to = "value") %>% 
  arrange(parameter)

kable(parameters_long) %>%
  kable_styling()

depth_levels

```



# Write file


```{r write_parameters}

parameters %>% write_csv(here::here("data/parameters",
                                    "parameters.csv"))

depth_levels %>% write_lines(here::here("data/parameters",
                                      "depth_levels.txt"))

```
